original_title: La vedova inconsolabile ringrazia quanti la consolarono
overview: After the death of Salvatore in a car accident, his beautiful wife Catherine is preparing to collect the enormous legacy but, because the deceased did not make a will and when he was alive was sterile, his wifeâ€™s legacy will benefit only if, within three hundred days established by law, she will give birth to a son.
title: The Winsome Widow
